vote.title:
26. Resolution Approving the Submission of the Fiscal Year 2023-24 Measure M2 
Year -End Expenditure Report
vote.description:
Department(s): Public Works Agency 
Recommended Action: Adopt a resolution approving the Measure M2 Annual 
Expenditure Report for Fiscal Year 2023-24 and authorize submission of the report 
to the Orange County Transportation Authority as required by Measure M2 Funding 
Eligibility Guidelines. 
RESOLUTION NO. 2024-077 entitled A RESOLUTION OF THE CITY COUNCIL 
OF THE CITY OF SANTA ANA CONCERNING THE MEASURE M2 
EXPENDITURE REPORT FOR THE CITY OF SANTA ANA
